body: @「ｋｉｌｌｅｒ ｑｕｅｅｎ」 No it wasn't like that. This story has prequels. This kid was formerly a normal guy, then one day he found a mobile phone application that can change his body into a child. After he used that app, he got into this relationship with his possible love interest, the black hair girl (and a bunch of others). This is a sequel to that story and from the look of the last page, someone gonna turn off the application to revert him back to normal adult.
So from what I understood, a kid prays to god and then gets laid in public but someone films it
感觉应该没错了……想不到还有什么其他人（女装春太郎？）
最後那個…不會是千秋吧？！
